title: Shall We Last Dance?
description: Hot Takedown unpacks how truthful, and useful, the Michael Jordan docu-series is and debates some potential NFL diversity hiring incentives. Plus, a cricket-themed Rabbit Hole

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
